articles.author: Alex Kirkland, Rodrigo Faez
articles.title: Top EU court rules UEFA, FIFA ban on Super League illegal - ESPN
articles.description: The European Union's top court ruled on Thursday that governing bodies FIFA and UEFA were abusing their dominant position by forbidding clubs outright to compete in a European Super League.
articles.content:
Dec 21, 2023, 04:14 AM ET
In a significant boost to the Super League project, Europe's top court ruled on Thursday that UEFA has been "abusing a dominant position" in its control of European footbal… [+5188 chars]

articles.author: Ishaan Tharoor
articles.title: Anti-migrant rhetoric boosts right-wing parties in Europe, United States - The Washington Post
articles.description: Donald Trump said undocumented migrants were “poisoning the blood” of the United States. In Europe, too, fears over migration are boosting right-wing parties.
